title: Every beginner players who just reached Level 30 wanting to start their elo climb be like:
body:
http://imgur.com/qWmylGx

_Makes you want to bitchslap the f*ck out of them, huh?_

replies.body:
That child is doing the community a great service.

He is giving other players the option to not play with an allied Yasuo unless they want to.
Downvoted for lack of Morgan Freeman.
I would forgive and re-upvote MuffledGarbage, thanks to you correcting the mistake, but apparently Morgan Freeman agrees with me, so I can't.

> [{quoted}](name=HMSLegends,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QOsgpIsA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-18T16:39:02.266+0000)
>
> My first ranked game I just played Aatrox. I someone threatened to report me.

OmG rEpOrTdD

One time my team banned all my champs, they ask me to play a tank and all I had left was a champ I never played before, who became my main from this. {{champion:36}} Oh boy was that game fun. Fed a bit, outscaled but lost because team was salty that I was first time and thought I was gonna do terrible. Now I'm a solo queue destroying {{champion:36}} who keeps getting S's for no reason.

My first ranked game. I played Nasus top against a diamond Vayne.... That was the worst round of my life. Remember kids... In high Elo you will be counter picked.

My second ranked game.

I was playing Jayce mid. Facing off against a  gold player. All in all I was doing decently. Top lane was another story. Our Darius was getting completely destroyed by their Yasuo. Suddenly he gets a double kill. Then he marches down to bot in an attempt to 2 vs 1 their fed bot lane. He lost. Then he began flaming my team for sucking. Particularly he began assaulting me. We lost since he began trolling and running down mid. The Darius was Platinum II.
Pretty sure Yasuo has no place in silver or below and possibly even gold or below
careful of the bronze monster new players, it will drag you to the depths of hell and you will never get out

On behalf of all bronze players.....

Yeah, that's pretty accurate.
I would pay him to do it.... for the enemy team
